resources.string: Log in to Plutonem using a phone number to enjoy shopping process.
Hmm, we can\'t find a Plutonem account connected to this phone number. Please sign up with this number first.
It looks like this registration is fail. Please try again later.
To proceed with this Google account, please provide the matching Plutonem password. This will be asked only once.
Enter the Phone of the Plutonem you\'d like to connect.
There was some trouble checking the phone number.
To create your new Plutonem account, please enter your phone number.
A duplicate buyer has been detected.
A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
